title: Ancient Egypt begins
description: The first dynasty of Egypt begins, marking the start of ancient Egyptian civilization

title: Great Wall of China construction begins
description: Construction of the Great Wall of China begins under the Qin dynasty

title: Gunpowder invented
description: Gunpowder is invented in China during the Tang dynasty

title: First Crusade begins
description: Pope Urban II calls for the First Crusade to recapture Jerusalem

title: Marco Polo reaches China
description: Venetian merchant Marco Polo reaches the court of Kublai Khan

title: Black Death reaches Europe
description: The Black Death plague arrives in Europe, killing millions

title: Gutenberg Bible printed
description: Johannes Gutenberg completes the first printed Bible using movable type

title: Leonardo da Vinci paints Mona Lisa
description: Leonardo da Vinci begins painting the Mona Lisa

title: Copernicus publishes heliocentric theory
description: Nicolaus Copernicus publishes his theory that Earth orbits the Sun

title: Shakespeare writes Romeo and Juliet
description: William Shakespeare writes his famous tragedy Romeo and Juliet

title: Galileo discovers Jupiter's moons
description: Galileo Galilei discovers the four largest moons of Jupiter

title: Newton publishes Principia
description: Isaac Newton publishes Philosophiæ Naturalis Principia Mathematica

title: Industrial Revolution begins
description: The Industrial Revolution begins in Great Britain

title: American Revolution begins
description: The American Revolutionary War begins with the Battles of Lexington and Concord

title: Declaration of Independence
description: The United States Declaration of Independence is adopted

title: French Revolution begins
description: The French Revolution begins with the storming of the Bastille

title: First steam locomotive
description: Richard Trevithick builds the first steam locomotive

title: Napoleon becomes Emperor
description: Napoleon Bonaparte crowns himself Emperor of France

title: Battle of Waterloo
description: Napoleon is defeated at the Battle of Waterloo

title: First photograph taken
description: Joseph Nicéphore Niépce takes the first photograph

title: Darwin publishes Origin of Species
description: Charles Darwin publishes On the Origin of Species

title: American Civil War begins
description: The American Civil War begins with the attack on Fort Sumter

title: First telephone call
description: Alexander Graham Bell makes the first telephone call

title: First electric light bulb
description: Thomas Edison demonstrates the first practical light bulb

title: Eiffel Tower completed
description: The Eiffel Tower is completed in Paris

title: First X-ray image
description: Wilhelm Röntgen takes the first X-ray image

title: First radio transmission
description: Guglielmo Marconi sends the first radio transmission

title: First powered flight
description: Wright brothers make the first powered, controlled flight

title: Einstein publishes relativity theory
description: Albert Einstein publishes his special theory of relativity

title: World War I begins
description: World War I begins with Austria-Hungary declaring war on Serbia

title: Russian Revolution
description: The Bolshevik Revolution begins in Russia

title: Women get right to vote in US
description: 19th Amendment gives women the right to vote in the US

title: First television broadcast
description: John Logie Baird demonstrates the first television broadcast

title: Stock Market Crash
description: The Wall Street Crash of 1929 begins the Great Depression

title: Hitler becomes Chancellor
description: Adolf Hitler becomes Chancellor of Germany

title: World War II begins
description: Germany invades Poland, starting World War II

title: Pearl Harbor attack
description: Japan attacks Pearl Harbor, bringing US into World War II

title: D-Day invasion
description: Allied forces land on Normandy beaches

title: Atomic bombs dropped on Japan
description: US drops atomic bombs on Hiroshima and Nagasaki

title: World War II ends
description: Japan formally surrendered aboard the USS Missouri in Tokyo Bay

title: First computer ENIAC
description: The ENIAC computer is completed at the University of Pennsylvania

title: DNA structure discovered
description: Watson and Crick discover the double helix structure of DNA

title: Sputnik launched
description: Soviet Union launches the first artificial satellite

title: First human in space
description: Yuri Gagarin becomes the first human in space

title: Cuban Missile Crisis
description: 13-day confrontation between US and Soviet Union

title: First Moon Landing
description: Apollo 11 mission successfully lands Neil Armstrong and Buzz Aldrin on the moon

title: First email sent
description: Ray Tomlinson sends the first email

title: Watergate scandal
description: Watergate scandal leads to President Nixon's resignation

title: Personal computer revolution
description: Apple Computer and Microsoft begin the personal computer revolution

title: Chernobyl disaster
description: Nuclear power plant disaster in Chernobyl, Ukraine

title: Berlin Wall falls
description: The Berlin Wall dividing East and West Germany is torn down

title: World Wide Web invented
description: Tim Berners-Lee proposes the World Wide Web

title: Soviet Union collapses
description: The Soviet Union officially dissolves

title: First web browser
description: Mosaic, the first popular web browser, is released

title: 9/11 attacks
description: Terrorist attacks on the World Trade Center and Pentagon

title: First iPhone released
description: Apple releases the first iPhone

title: Barack Obama elected
description: Barack Obama becomes the first African American US President

title: COVID-19 pandemic begins
description: WHO declares COVID-19 a global pandemic
